articles.title: England's Stuart Broad says 8-15 in 2015 Ashes was 'amazing feeling' and left him in a 'daze' - Sky Sports
articles.description: Stuart Broad reflected on the "amazing feeling" of his 8-15 as he re-watched his superb Ashes spell at Trent Bridge in 2015.
articles.content:
